extendedInfo.description: READ ABOUT OUR MONEY BACK GUARANTEEWin Roulette is not just a voice activated roulette simulator,but the paid version includes a betting methodology that is somathematically sound that we can offer you a money back guarantee when you purchase it.If you fail to double your bankroll or make $500 profit, whichever is the smallest,you will receive either a full refund of the purchase price,if the purchase was made directly from Cyberactivities using PayPal,or a refund of the purchase price minus the 30% android market commission,if the purchase was made from the androidmarketplace. Either way, we don't keep a penny of your money.The simulator offers a full range of both touchscreen and voice activated bettingand is perfect for practicing the Win Roulette Betting System.
